roleset.name: nag, pester

example.name: adjectival
example.text: At the moment, however, the painting is a nagging reminder of the problems that have engulfed CenTrust and its flamboyant chairman and chief executive, David L. Paul.

example.name: ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: You nagged him to buy that car;

roleset.note: NAG-V NOTES: Frames file for 'nag' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from nag.01-v predicate notes)
